name: Final Gala
description:
Escape a GalaRoom thats being hit by multiple meteors. Plot twist, you are playing as the president and you may a bit too much alcohol in your system..

Your only chance is to meet your bodyguard thats waiting for you on the roof. His helicopter is ready to proceed to your evacuation.

Survive, and find your way to the elevator that is going to save your life.

ps : No AI was hurt during the developpement of this game ( kinda )

Known bugs :

A lot, but especially the red indicator not showing all the time  when meteors lands.

Modeling : Maryne Tixier, Floriane Dorca,  Alexandre Barrault

Game Scripting : Alexandre Barrault
